attributes.action: Stop the topic of “my body” in Scottish primary schools.
attributes.additional_details: This shouldn’t be taught to children as this is filth. This is not sexual education, this is sexual exploitation and should not be taught to children of this age! Children of this age (3-7) do not have any reason to know about this.
attributes.background: Primary & nursery school children in Scotland are now being taught about their own bodies.The parts of the bodies that they’re teaching children about are “ the nipples, the scrotum & testicles, the penis and the vulva” this is outrageous as it is being taught to children in nursery and primary 1.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to petition the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:
http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
